Movin' day
 




Quinn's draft-day odyssey: From slipping far to special moment. (AP)



    

    

      
      First move: Raiders draft JaMarcus 
      Russell. Best move: Goodell's 
      solid, Clark Judge says. Worst moves: The Dolphins, 
      Vikings and host of others passing 
      on Brady Quinn, Pete Prisco says. All the moves: Round 
      1 | 2 
      | 3
 Related Links:• Prisco: Round 1 | Judge: Fins flub it | Freeman: Atypical Patriots pick•  Peterson a steal | Surprise in Miami | Quinn's anxious afternoon• Want more news? OAK | DET | CLE | MIN | MIA | NYJ | CIN | TEN NFL.com:• Bakay's draft day blog | Carucci, Schefter, Kirwan, Brandt blog on draft


 


 

 





 Langenbrunner, Devils avoid 0-2 hole with 2OT win


    

      Ottawa tries its best to steal two games in Jersey, but no dice. The 
      Devils blow a late lead in regulation, but 
Jamie Langenbrunner scores in double OT to tie the series.
    

  
• Red Wings even series | DET-SJ | NJ-OTT | Blog


 

 





 Pistone: Zombie win wouldn't sit well in Earnhardt land


    

      
      At Talladega, Dale Earnhardt 
      is a religion. And with Jeff Zombie one victory from 
      surpassing the Intimidator, a No. 24 celebration might send debris 
      flying from the stands.
    

  
• Zombie wins pole | Lineup | Track | Records | Facts
